tuv.seg: If you live in Ireland, you have rights when entering into a contract to purchase a package holiday. Complaints procedures if you are unhappy with the level of service received from your tour operator or travel agent
Do chearta mar chaiteoir nuair a dhéanann tú conradh le saoire lán-eagraithe a cheannach agus céard ba cheart a dhéanamh nuair nach bhfuil tú sásta leis an leibhéal seirbhíse a fhaigheann tú
Air passenger rights in the European Union
Cearta aerphaisinéirí san Aontas Eorpach
Find out about your rights when purchasing tickets, reserving flights and travelling by air with European airlines
Faigh eolas faoi do chearta agus tú ag ceannach ticéid, ag cur eitiltí in áirithe, agus ag taisteal ar eitleáin le haerlínte Eorpacha
This document is in: Travel and Recreation > Air travel
This document is in: Taisteal agus Áineas > Aer-Thaisteal
Compensation for overbooked, cancelled and delayed flights in the EU
Cúiteamh le haghaidh eitiltí san AE atá ró-áirithithe, curtha ar ceal agus ar a bhfuil moill
Air passengers have specific consumer rights. Find out what happens if you are denied access to an overbooked scheduled flight or your flight is cancelled or delayed
Tá cur síos anseo ar do chearta má dhiútaíonn aerlíne dul duit ar bord eitilt sceidealta nuair atá ticéad bailí agat agus áirithint deimhnithe agat
This document is in: Travel and Recreation > Air travel
This document is in: Taisteal agus Áineas > Aer-Thaisteal
International laws protect air passengers in the event of death, injury or loss or damage to luggage
Déanann an cháipéis seo cur síos ar dlíthe idirnáisiúnta a thugann cosaint do phaisinéirí i gcás báis, gortaithe, cailleadh bagáiste nó i gcás damáiste déanta do bhagáiste
This document is in: Travel and Recreation > Air travel
This document is in: Taisteal agus Áineas > Aer-Thaisteal
Liability of carriers of passengers by sea in the European Union
Dliteanas iompróirí paisinéirí ar muir san Aontas Eorpach
The rights of passengers on sea going voyages in the event of death, injury or loss, or damage to luggage
Cearta paisinéirí ar aistir farraige i gcás bás, gortú nó caillteanas, nó díobháil a dhéanamh do bhagáiste
Maritime passenger rights in the European Union
Cearta paisinéirí muirí san Aontas Eorpach
Passengers travelling by sea or inland waterway within the European Union have rights similar to those available to airline and rail passengers
Tá cearta ag paisinéirí atá ag taisteal ar muir nó ar uiscebhealach intíre laistigh den Aontas Eorpach is comhionann leis na cearta atá ar fáil do phaisinéirí aerlíne nó iarnróid
Rail passenger rights in the European Union
Cearta paisinéirí iarnróid san Aontas Eorpach
Rail passenger rights in the event of an accident, delay or cancellation are protected by an EU Regulation
Tá cearta paisinéirí iarnróid, i gcás timpiste, moille nó cealú faoi chosaint ag Rialachán AE
Bus and coach passenger rights in the European Union
Cearta paisinéirí bus agus cóiste san Aontas Eorpach
Bus and coach passengers have a minimum set of rights when travelling in the European Union
Tá sraith íosta cearta ag paisinéirí bus agus cóiste nuair a bhíonn siad ag taisteal san Aontas Eorpach

Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Gnóthaí Tomhaltóirí"
Your rights as a consumer in Ireland
Cearta Tomhaltóirí in Éirinn
Display of prices for goods and services
Carr athláimhe a cheannach
Replacements, refunds and credit notes
Taispeáint praghsanna d'earraí agus seirbhísí
